feed.title: Elk Island (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:58 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -11.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 2:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
Temperature: -11.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: SE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness late this morning. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023
